oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville, Tenn. Cumberland River, between 1901 and 1908
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A postcard of the Cumberland River Wharf in downtown Nashville as seen from the Shelby Street Bridge. Several boats are docked at the river bank. A number of businesses line First Avenue. Both the Woodland Street Bridge and the Jefferson Street Bridge are pictured in the distance. Forms part of the Norton Postcard Collection. 1 postcard : col. ; 3.5 x 5.5 in.
